text.tspan: Find the angle of the bottom side of the gap rectangle:
Goal: make the gap (the red rectangle)
Find position of the bottom right corner of the gap:
This is for when the origin is at (0,0) but we were in
(centerX,centerY) so adjust the x and y:
Now, update the angle to the next side of the gap:
Find position of the top right corner of the gap:
This is for when the origin is at (0,0) but we were in
bottom right corner so adjusted the x and y with
Repeat the prevous two steps for other sides
